/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, mostly white and gray, are adorned with colorful graffiti, adding a vibrant touch to the otherwise monochrome palette. The trees, bare of leaves, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene.
